buwa mahaththaya kiyapu ekenma penne oya paksha wala inna undalage awasthawadaya misa wena mokakda?unta prathipaththiyak naha.thamun kiyana dewal sirayas ganne naha.ada esbi ta ranilta wiraya kiyala heta buruwa kiyannath ada mahindata modaya kiyala heta rajathuma kiyannath kisi awulak naththe eekayi.hari ho waradi jewipi un thamun kiyana de wenuwen mulu agenma peni innawa.ratata penna boruwata randu wenawa nemeyi.eekama mata nam loku wenasak.buwa ha kandula dedenama jawipe minimaru gathiya gana kathakarala thibuna.me dedenama adu wadi washayen yuanpi sapotarla bawayi mage mathakaya.88 gana kathakarana nisa mama me prashna tika mathukaranna kamathiyi.1.82 janadhipathiwaranayata idiripath wela prajathanthrawadiwa aanduwata abhiyoga karamin idiriyata pamini jawipe 1983 di yuanpiya thahanam kale ayi?2.ema thahanama samaga 82 hora janamathawicharanaya ta erehiwa rohana wijewira gonu kota thibu pethsama sarthaka lesa wibhaga wima balapawada?nadda?3.83 pakshaya thahanam kalata pasu jawipe ema thahanama iwath karana lesa illa rajayatath,jathyanthara sanwidhanawalatath,adhikarana aayathanawalatath illim nawatha nawathath idiripath nala.ema illim salaka balanawa wenuwata ee wanawita aayuda sannaddhawimak gana sithalawath nothibunu paksha samajikayan athadanguwata ganimin watalim karamin prajathanthrawadi pakshayak matha mardhanaya diyath kale kawuda?methanadi jawipe samajikayanta wikalpa dekakthibuna.ekko jayawardhana nakiyage asadharana thahanama pili aragena deshapalanaya karana eka athharala gedarata wela nidiyana eka.kandulayi buwayi kamathi ehema deyak unoth mama hithanne.anith eka jayawardhanage mardhanayata muhuna dena eka.yatibimgatha wena eka.jewipi deweni aragalaya mathuwenna parisaraya hadune ehemayi.jewipi karayo kiyanne agaharu loken path una eya nemeyine.me rate duppath panthiwala minissu wisheshayen tharuna kotas - owun athara ugath aya boho hitiya - ne karali gahala nagitte.unta samakamiwa prajathanthrawadawa deshapalanaya karanna thibunu ida udura aragena jayawardhana genagiya janatha wirodhi palanaya hinda thamayi ehema aragalayakata ida hadune.eeta passe jawipe 88 kala ghathana gana kiwwane.api mehema ahamuko.1.ee kalaya thula jawipe wisin ghathanaya kala pirisa kopamanada?2.prajathanthrawadi yuanpi aanduwa wisin ghathanaya kala pirisa kopamanada?kandulayi buwayi puluwan nam sankhya hoyala dannako.mama danna tharamin rajaya athin ghathanaya wuna pramanaya 60 000 ta aasannayi.jawipe athin ghathanaya wuna kiyana pramanaya 6000 ta aasannayi.ethakota 6000 marapu jawipe minimaru wela 60 000 k marapu ejapaya kandulageyi buwageyi aadaraniya pakshaya une kohomada?batalandata gawunu ranil unnahe shreshta nayakaya une kohomada?aasa nam kiyawanna hoyagena prins gunasekarage lost jenareshan kiyana potha.88-89 siddi gana niyama fast hand ekspiriyans akawunt ekak.gunasekara hamudawen athurudahan karawapu tharunayo wenuwen manawa himikam nadu katha kala jyeshta nithignyayek.anthimata minihatath rata dala panala yanna una aanduwen maranna hewwa nisa.jawipe minimaru gathiya gana pora tok dena mahaththanla thamunge pakshaye athwala thawarunu le gana no katha no sina manda?
